Lambda.Launch: Whether or not to launch new pipelines.

LambdaConfig.AMI: AMI id of the developer-configured instance
LambdaConfig.IAM_ROLE: permissions to launch new immutable analysis environments
LambdaConfig.KEY_NAME: permissions to access immutable analysis environments
LambdaConfig.COMMAND: code to run to initiate processing
LambdaConfig.SHUTDOWN_BEHAVIOR: destroy immutable analysis environment after processing terminates
LambdaConfig.MISSING_CONFIG_ERROR: We need a config file to analyze data.
LambdaConfig.DEPLOY_LIMIT: Maximum number of concurrent instances to deploy

Affiliates.ContactEmail: The email we should notify regarding processing status.
The email we should notify regarding processing status.
